description:
Ahhh red heads! Hope you like 'em, cuz here is a cute one with a big one!
Wade grew up a military kid, bouncing from city to city. He later did a short stint in the military.
Not sure if he left because he was gay, but I'm glad he is playing on our team.
Wade is not much of a porn watcher, having worked in an adult video store a while back. He's pretty much seen it all. He just told me to setup a mirror and he could watch himself, and also make sure he was doing what supposed to. When he gets his dick to full mast it's pretty impressive.
Wade has a tendency to hold his breath, so I struggled to get him to breathe for you. Hope you enjoy him as you will be seeing him in the future in action.
title: Wade - Solo
